select exhibition_id , exhibition_name , status , start_time , end_time , address , organizer from busi_exhibition where exhibition_id IN ( select exhibition_id from busi_send where send_id IN ( select send_id from busi_receive where status = 2 and del = 1 group by send_id ) and status = 3 and del = 1 ) and del = 1 and status = 2
and exhibition_name like concat ('%', #{exhibitionName},'%')
and organizer like concat ('%', #{organizer},'%')
and address like concat ('%', #{address},'%')
SELECT arrange_id as arrangeId, arrange_url as arrangeUrl, thumb_image AS thumbImage, file_name as fileName FROM busi_arrange WHERE exhibition_id = #{exhibitionId}
